s:pt with C/O Mental Health for 2 days that is frequent. patient is a 67 yr old white f soldier. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 5 years in her past denies any smoking o:Height 177 cm, Weight 59 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed haloperidol - 1 mg 2 x day.
